summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 65th Street; by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7620 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
